WIDER FACE.from sentence:
WIDER FACE :
As shows , our hybrid - resolution model ( HR ) achieves state - of - the - art performance on all difficulty levels , but most importantly , reduces error on the " hard " set by 2X .

Our out - of - the - box detector ( HR ).from sentence:
FDDB :
Our out - of - the - box detector ( HR ) outperforms all published results on the discrete score , which uses a standard 50 % intersection - over - union threshold to define correctness .

Our regressor.from sentence: Our regressor is trained with 10 - fold cross validation .

our detector.from sentence: With the post - hoc regressor , our detector achieves state - of - the - art performance on the continuous score ( measuring average bounding - box overlap ) as well .
